recipesJson.name: Banana Put'in
recipesJson.author: RinVapes
recipesJson.description:
Banana pudding... not much more to say. Good right away.


*I mix low percentages so you may need to increase them to suit your tastes*

ST Vapes and Mark Fagan both love it

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kcvfIMRponY&t=177s

reviews.text: I whipped this up this morning and am vaping it now. Really delicious, solid recipe. It's a great base for adding extras too, which I plan on doing at some stage. Nice work Rin.
